General.Name: Okea ASA
General.Description: OKEA ASA, an oil and gas company, engages in the development and production of oil and gas in the Norwegian continental shelf. The company holds 44.56% interests in Draugen, 12% interests in Gjøa, 9.2385% interests in Ivar Aasen, 6% interests in Nova, and 15% interests in Yme assets. OKEA ASA was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.
